name: pollinations-project-management
description: Automated project management scripts for Pollinations.AI ecosystem

scripts.build: npm run migrate && npm run generate-readme
scripts.dev: npm run validate && npm run build
scripts.update-all: npm run update-stars && npm run migrate && npm run generate-readme && npm run validate
scripts.submit-project: echo 'Please use the GitHub issue template at: https://github.com/pollinations/pollinations/issues/new?template=project-submission.yml'
scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm run migrate      - Convert legacy data to structured format
  npm run generate-readme - Update README with latest projects
  npm run update-stars - Update GitHub star counts
  npm run validate     - Validate project data integrity
  npm run build        - Full build process
  npm run update-all   - Complete update cycle'

author: Pollinations.AI Team
